title: Router: Testing + quality (neutral)
description: Routes testing and quality intents to appropriate packs: pyramid, contracts, goldens, property, fuzz (safe).

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[Testing request] --> K{Need?}
  K -->|baseline pyramid| P[pack.tests.pyramid.baseline.neutral.v1]
  K -->|contract tests| C[pack.tests.contracts.neutral.v1]
  K -->|golden files| G[pack.tests.golden_files.neutral.v1]
  K -->|property-based| R[pack.tests.property_based.neutral.v1]
  K -->|fuzz safe| F[pack.tests.fuzz.safe.neutral.v1]
  P --> Done[Done]
  C --> Done
  G --> Done
  R --> Done
  F --> Done
